member.name: M:BeachTenisAPI.Controllers.UserController.GetUserInfo
member.summary: Returns a list of all Users from the DB.

member.name: M:BeachTenisAPI.Controllers.UserController.GetUserInfo(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a specific user by his CPF.
member.param: CPF of the user to search.

member.name: M:BeachTenisAPI.Controllers.UserController.Post(System.String,System.String,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Adds a new user to the DB.
member.param: CPF of the new user. Note that if a CPF already exists, it will return 403 code.
